Posts.Content: Do you know the name of the medicine that takes it away? I've had lymphedema for 14 years and it's really a problem for me. Stuck with my achor - pump that I'm hooked up to for 90 minutes twice a day to keep swelling under control. My skin is so tight I feel it will tear. It's got nothing to do with how careful you are! Some folks get it and some don't.
Posts.Title: lymphedema concerns
